verbose_text: In this study, we found that DHA treatment induced the upregulation of caveolin 1 (Cav1) and mitochondrial carrier homolog 2 (MTCH2) in HeLa cells, and this was associated with the DHA induced inhibition of cell viability and DHA induced apoptosis.
evidence: DHA treatment induced the upregulation of caveolin 1 (Cav1) and mitochondrial carrier homolog 2
